channel.title: [317] Minigame help
channel.description:
Hello i'm working on a 317 minigame.
I want it so add the end you get a key from the previous monster. Then it teles you to another place.
(this is where i need help)
I want it so if you use the item on a chest you both Tele to home, and recieve a item. I've done this before but i kind of went on a 6 month break from coding, and got a little rusty at 317's. So if you could help me, i would greatly app. it
Thanks Alot -Sexy Slay
